update PERMISSION

METHOD = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIBTION = #{describtion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update PERMISSION set URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, METHOD = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIBTION = #{describtion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
